title: Hwayoung posts to social media after recent T-ara controversy | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Hwayoung posts to social media after recent T-ara controversy By elliefilet 10 minutes ago 5,209 223 1 0 SEE ALSO: [MVP OP-ED] - The death of a K-Pop generation On February 11, Hwayoung posted the below photo of a cake to Instagram along with the message, "Su-Ah unni's mother made this for me. #cake #thankyou #alltogether #newyear #dontgetsick #behealthy #fullmoon." Followers left a variety of comments ranging from, "You're ugly," and "Are you going to continue acting like you don't know? Everyone knows who you really are, but it seems like you and your unni don't know," to "T-ara fans are funny. What do you mean by 5 lost years? They still what they did on Twitter." What are your thoughts on the comments?
